nodes.bodyText: Where we build the mytemplate module. Another test?
Also shall we check whether the target directory stuff cleaned ( ex. balo, jar etc)

Yes, the mytemplate module is built in the dependent test testBuildCommand.
There isn't actually a way to check if the relevant target directory resources are cleaned in the test case since it is an intermediate step and the artifacts will get replaced. However, this was verified when debugging the code.
